page.title: 12THE AUTHORS
page.content:
This information was completed by a newly formed branch of the Womens Institute.{Dinas Powys and St Andrews {Morning Womens Institute}was formed in 1984 to give the advantages of the largest womens' organisation in England and Wales to a wider section of women ie those unable toattend evening meetings and those with children.
The Dinas Powys and St Andrews Morning W.I. also acknowledge the help of friends and husbands.
This information was computed by{Tony {Smith}(genius son of one of the members !!!).
